trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The strokes that represent the possible gesture.
trans-unit.target: 表示可能的笔势描边。

trans-unit.source: The results from the gesture recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 来自势识别器的结果。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether strokes should be considered a gesture.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是否应将笔画视为笔势。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture> event occurs, the value of the Cancel property depends on the first <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> in the collection returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture>事件发生时，取消属性的值依赖于第一个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>中返回的集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture>

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.ApplicationGesture%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>, or if it is a gesture whose <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A> is a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>, then Cancel is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.ApplicationGesture%2A>属性是<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>，或如果它是一个笔势其<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A>是一个值，而不<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>，取消则`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.ApplicationGesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, Cancel is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，取消是`false`。

trans-unit.source: When Cancel is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> adds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes%2A> to its <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 取消时`false`，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>将添加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes%2A>到其<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: When Cancel is `true`, the strokes are not added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 取消时`true`，描边不会添加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the strokes are ink; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the strokes are a gesture.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果笔划墨迹;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果笔划很笔势。

trans-unit.source: Returns results from the gesture recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 笔势识别器从返回的结果。

trans-unit.source: The collection returned by the GetGestureRecognitionResults method is sorted by the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 按 GetGestureRecognitionResults 方法返回的集合进行排序<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, GetGestureRecognitionResults might return a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> objects with the following values: |Index|ApplicationGesture|RecognitionConfidence| |-----------|------------------------|---------------------------| |0|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |1|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |2|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |3|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| This means that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes that it is very likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a check mark, relatively likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> in not a gesture, and not at all likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a curlicue or a double curlicue.
trans-unit.target: 例如，GetGestureRecognitionResults 可能返回的<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>对象具有以下值的集合: |索引 |ApplicationGesture |RecognitionConfidence | |-----------|------------------------|---------------------------| |&0; |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&1; |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&2; |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&3; |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| 这意味着，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>识别出这是很有可能，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>复选标记，有可能，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>不是笔势和根本不可能，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>使用花或 double 使用花。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The GetGestureRecognitionResults method can return an array with <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> with a higher degree of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> than it has for other application gestures.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> GetGestureRecognitionResults 方法可以返回具有数组<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>有更高程度的<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>不是它还具有用于其他应用程序笔势。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>

trans-unit.source: This means that it is more likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is not a gesture, as opposed to a gesture that has a lower <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着很有可能，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>不手势，而不是，具有较低<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>笔势</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: A collection of possible application gestures that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes*> might be.
trans-unit.target: 笔势的可能的应用程序的集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes*>可能。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes*>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, provides a way to invoke event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase efficiency over the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，使您能够以基实现相比可提高效率的特定类型的方式调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The generic handler / delegate implementation to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 泛型处理程序 / 委托实现调用。

trans-unit.source: The target on which the provided handler should be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 应在其调用提供的处理程序的目标。

trans-unit.source: Gets the strokes that represent the possible gesture.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示可能的笔势描边。

trans-unit.source: The strokes that represent the possible gesture.
trans-unit.target: 表示可能的笔势描边。
